'''Easy Does It''' is [[Aloy]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If a character gets too close to the animals, they will still get startled regardless if one was walking or not attacking at all. Likewise, if an animal is killed, the rest nearby will also become startled.
* {{TalentNote|character=Aloy|talent=Easy Does It|alive}}
